Source code for phinet.configlib

""" Configuration library for experiments.

Authors:
    Francesco Paissan, 2023

"""
from typing import Dict, Any
import logging
import pprint
import sys
import argparse
import types



[docs]class SimpleNamespace(types.SimpleNamespace):

[docs]    def update(self, dictionary):
        self.__dict__.update(dictionary)



logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)

parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description=__doc__, fromfile_prefix_chars="@")

config: SimpleNamespace = SimpleNamespace()



[docs]def add_parser(title: str, description: str = ""):
    """Create a new context for arguments and return a handle."""
    return parser.add_argument_group(title, description)




[docs]def parse(save_fname: str = "") -> Dict[str, Any]:
    """Parse given arguments."""
    config.update(vars(parser.parse_args()))
    logging.info("Parsed %i arguments.", len(config.__dict__))
    # Save passed arguments
    if save_fname:
        with open(save_fname, "w") as fout:
            fout.write("\n".join(sys.argv[1:]))
        logging.info("Saving experiment arguments to %s.", save_fname)
    return config




[docs]def print_config():
    """Print the current config to stdout."""
    pprint.pprint(config.__dict__)
